tl.Util

Class TConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • tl.Util.TConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<TConfigLoader.Setting>

    public class TConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<TConfigLoader.Setting>
    TConfig represents a configuration file and all its options and their values.
    An option's value can be changed to anything that overrides the toString() method.
    Since:
    8th August, 2013
    Author:
    Callum Nichols

      void clear()

      Returns a list of all the options found within the configuration file.

      Returns an option's value.
      java.util.Iterator<TConfigLoader.Setting> iterator()

      Set's the path name to the path name specified.

      Sets an option's value to anything that overrides the toString() method.

      • getValue

        public java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String option)
                          throws TException
        Returns an option's value. If the option isn't found, a TException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        option - - The name of the option as it appears in its respective configuration file
        Returns:
        - The option's value, or throws an exception
        Throws:
        TException

      • setValue

        public <T> void setValue(java.lang.String option,
                T value)
              throws TException
        Sets an option's value to anything that overrides the toString() method.
        If the option isn't found, a TException is thrown.
        Parameters:
        option - - The option that's value needs changing
        value - - The value to replace with
        Throws:
        TException

      • getOptions

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getOptions()
        Returns a list of all the options found within the configuration file.
        Returns:
        - A List of all the options
